User’s documentation¶

Hi there VIKI user.

We have selected some documents that might be of use to you. They are all focussed on using VIKI. There’s no information on writing your own stuff (contributing) or even developing. For those purposes there is another documentation.

  1. Installation - Get VIKI installed correctly on your system
  2. Quick start guide - Start your very own turtle-simulator and control it!
  3. Features - An overview of things VIKI can do for you
